description:
In case you needed any more proof that the UK government despises freedom, here it is.

The Rushmoor Borough Council has proposed an injunction that would criminalize street preaching as they believe this causes “distress.”

(1) LABOUR COUNCIL TRIES TO BAN AND CRIMINALISE CHRISTIAN STREET PREACHERS

A group of street preachers in Aldershot and Farnborough are at the centre of what is believed to be an unprecedented legal battle with a local authority which has tried to impose an injunction that… pic.twitter.com/X1qBAVIWve
— Christian Concern (@CConcern) March 29, 2025
title: UK proposes new anti-free speech law aiming to jail street preachers for "causing offense"

description:
If the word has been using “they/them” pronouns since the beginning of time, then there would be no need to lecture the masses to “affirm their truth.” Nonetheless, Cynthia Erivo, who is worth millions, is pretending to be oppressed because the world won’t jump on her bandwagon.

UNBELIEVABLE: Uber-wealthy celebrity Cynthia Erivo complains to the world that life is so hard because people won't use "They/Them" pronouns.

You can't make this up. pic.twitter.com/BuvAwqPdYR
— Townhall.com (@townhallcom) March 31, 2025<
title: Disney actress criticizes society for making her life SO HARD for not calling her a they/them

description:
The point of trans indoctrination is to start young. This is why one UK nursery suspended a toddler for being “transphobic,” and it’s unclear how society has degraded this much.

A toddler was kicked out of a nursery for being transphobic.

The 3-year-old is being accused of abuse and discrimination, on the basis of "gender identity."

In the same academic year, 94 students were suspended from public school for transphobia or "gender identity" violations. pic.twitter.com/PDTYwbCfO7
— Gays Against Groomers (@againstgrmrs) March 31, 2025
title: A toddler was accused of being "transphobic," kicked out of nursery school as a punishment: report

description:
The left will point the finger at the right and call them racist for disagreeing with them politically. However, in reality, many of them could not be more racist if they tried.

A resurfaced clip of Jasmine Crockett shows her blasting Byron Donalds for marrying a white woman, and to call it racist would be an understatement.

Let’s see what interviewer has the guts to ask her about this in upcoming media appearances. Objectively racist statements from the new head of the Democratic Party. https://t.co/NibzNgmeZK
— Scott Jennings (@ScottJenningsKY) March 30, 2025
title: Jasmine Crocket, new head of the  Democratic Party, goes on racist rant about who a Congressional colleague is married to

description:
According to the left, you should be terrified about what’s to come as a result of these tariffs. Today’s show breaks down how this will actually affect your family.

“This is directly aimed at China,” Crowder said. “China has been taking advantage of a huge loophole.”

Last week, Trump imposed a 25% tariff on automobile imports. This is intended to strengthen the manufacturing industry in America while also “taking action to end unfair trade practices that jeopardize U.S. national security,” according to the White
title: Watch: Trump's "Liberation Day" is coming, and here's how the tariffs will affect your family

description:
President Donald Trump’s latest tariffs are set to take effect this week, DOGE discovered non-citizens are obtaining social security numbers through asylum applications and subsequently voting in what appears to be a massive scandal, NBC sounded the alarm regarding Trump serving a third term in office, the United Kingdom’s sentencing counsel introduced a new era reminiscent of Jim Crow’s America, we admonished Steven’s shark knowledge or lack thereof, and so much more!

THE TARRIFIER

  • Reciprocal Trade
title: Social Security Scandal: How Elites Use Illegals to Game The American System (Sources)

description:
Elon Musk and his D.O.G.E. team have been doing great work, though the messaging of that work has been sloppy at best. It's presented in a way where edgelords can share posts on X and say "BASED" in all caps and leaves way too much room for the left and the media (but I repeat myself) to be handed ammo. To Americans in the middle, the work can look reckless and cruel. One of the problems of cutting the size of government is "we need to cut the size of government... but not like that."

If this past weekend's town hall in Wisconsin is any indication, it looks like Cousin Elon has landed on a way to explain D.O.G.E.'s work in a way that the average American worker can understand and say, "Dude, that's messed up."

Let's talk Social Security and non-citizens.

“Th
title: “This is mind-blowing": Elon Musk drops disturbing data on the massive social security fraud committed by non-citizens (and how)

description:
Stephen A. Smith won't change the way he votes any more than Bill Maher or Jon Stewart will. It's still entertaining and valuable when he calls out the left and the media (but I repeat myself) to a mainstream audience that wouldn't normally hear such things. Like with SignalGate. And how the people calling for Pete Hegseth to be fired weren't this outraged when the People Who Controlled Joe Biden Adminstration's incompetence led to thirteen service members being killed during the Afghanistan withdrawal.

To recap SignalGate, National Security Advisor Michael Waltz, or someone working for him, "accidentally" invited anti-Trump jorunalismer Jeffrey Goldberg to a group chat about the Houthis being taken out. And because of Waltz's f*ck up... the media and the left (but I repeat myself0 still butthurt they couldn't collect his scalp want
title: Stephen A. Smith goes scorched Earth on media's SignalGate obsession: "Were y'all talking about 13 lives lost in Afghanistan?"
